Articles.Content: I was seeing if Nova's new 2m to dual 1m plate would work with two e-1000s. Obviously it didn't. Fortunately jeb's piloting skillzzzz saved the day by landing the crew pod right side up.

My most recent rocket exploded on the launch pad. Somehow the engine pasted itself against the side of the launch tower, and continued burning without any fuel source, and the crew module landed safely for no apparent reason. Screen cap attached.
